attributes.action: All MP's & staff to have Covid19 Vaccine to attend & work at Parliament by law.
attributes.additional_details: It is only correct & fair that any restrictions being placed on the general public to attend any site, venue, place of work or mode of transport must be followed & adhered to by those passing these restrictions on the people.
attributes.background: MP's & all staff who attend the Houses of Parliament, must all have up to date Covid19 Vaccinations to be able to be on site & work to represent the public.
